TEXT.TITLE: EG AND G <EGG> UNIT WINS GOVERNMENT CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY: EG and G said its EG and G Services unit was awarded a contract to provide facilities operations, maintenance and related services for the U.S. government's chemical decontamination training facility at Fort McClellan, Ala. Terms were not disclosed. Reuter
